answers.answer: Have you had any thyroid tests done?  Ask your doctor for TSH, Free T3 and Free T4.

question: So for few months now I've had diarrhea.  Done many tests which has found nothing.  A few test results are:Vitamin D - 23Glucose - 103CHOLESTEROL	115 - 200 mg/dL	210TRIGLYCERIDE	10 - 149 mg/dL	294HDL	40 - 60 mg/dL	28LDL, CALCULATED	50 - 130 mg/dL	123Not sure if the high Tri's and Chol are any indication as well as the Glucose over 100, but I'm running out of idea's!  I've lost 15Lbs in 1.5 months.  Any thoughts?
title: Am I entering Pre-Diabetes?
